data.name: Grape Jelly
data.detailed_description:
Adventure and romance! Wishlist and follow!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/687800/Heads_Will_Roll_Reforged/


Play for free!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/385530/Astro_Lords/


About the Game

English:
Take on the role of sweet grape jelly! Help him jump over various obstacles. Dial the highest score, beat all records! But be careful, because with every second the game gets complicated, and you only have 3 lives.
In Game:
-Colour map,
-Obstacles,
-Beautiful music,
-Not a less handsome character :)
-and other...


________________________________________________________________________________________
Русский:
Возьмите на себя роль милого виноградного желе! Помогите ему перепрыгивать различные препятсвтия. Наберите самый высокий показатель очков, побейте все рекорды! Но будьте осторожны, ведь с каждой секундой игра усложняется, а у вас всего 3 жизни.
В игре:
-Красочная карта,
-Препятствия,
-Красивая музыка,
-Не менее красивый персонаж :)
-и другое...

data.short_description: Dial the highest score, beat all records! But be careful, because with every second the game gets complicated, and you only have 3 lives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 duo +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
